item.title: Post: Smug mode activated
item.description: I checked the site at Fit on a Floppy. Websites are getting bigger and bigger. The internet is getting faster and faster but not everywhere at the same pace. A floppy is a physical reminder of filesize. The first page fits, at least. Thanks to little efforts like when I weighed the site.
item.content:encoded:
I checked the site at Fit on a Floppy.

Websites are getting bigger and bigger. The internet is getting faster and faster but not everywhere at the same pace. A floppy is a physical reminder of filesize.

The first page fits, at least. Thanks to little efforts like when I weighed the site.
